channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: New Orleans mourns victims of truck attack with tearful vigil and celebration of life
item.description: New Orleans has held a vigil on Bourbon Street to mourn and celebrate the lives of those killed when a man rammed a pickup truck into a crowd, killing and injuring revelers celebrating the new year.

item.title: Drawn to New Orleansâ€™ iconic street of celebration, a night of partying becomes a nightmare
Drivers skid and crash as wintry mix grips central US before moving east
